analyzed: ma dpyad par chos kun du bsten pa'o zhes bya ba 'di sbyin pa dang tshul khrims la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi chos de'i mthong ba dang ma mthong ba'i 'bras bu 'di yin no zhes ma dpyad par ba lang gi khyu'i tshul du 'jug ces bya ba'i tha

analyzed: de ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems drug cu po grangs brgyad dang ldan pa 'di dag ni rgyun gyi sems bdun du 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, these sixty thoughts of attachment and so on, which have eight numbers, become seventy moments of thought.

original: 'dir grangs bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgyun gyi sems gcig kho nar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gong du rgyun gyi sems grangs bzhir bgrang ba brtsis zin pa nyid kyi phyir yang mi bgrang ngo //
analyzed: 'dir grangs bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgyun gyi sems gcig kho nar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gong du rgyun gyi sems grangs bzhir bgrang ba brtsis zin pa nyid kyi phyir yang mi bgrang ngo //
translated: Here, the one moment of thought of the continuum that has four numbers is not counted again because it was already counted above as the four moments of thought of the continuum.

original: de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems 'di dag nyid gong du bshad pa'i grangs lnga gnyis su bsgyur na grangs bcur 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems 'di dag nyid gong du bshad pa'i grangs lnga gnyis su bsgyur na grangs bcur 'gyur te /
translated: Similarly, these thoughts of attachment and so on, when the five numbers explained above are doubled, become ten.

original: des na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems 'di dag rgyun gyi sems grangs bcur yongs su chud pa drug tu 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: des na 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems 'di dag rgyun gyi sems grangs bcur yongs su chud pa drug tu 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, these minds of desire and so on are to be understood as six, included in the ten types of mind in the continuum.

original: de ltar na gong du bshad pa'i sems ni drug cu'o //
analyzed: de ltar na gong du bshad pa'i sems ni drug cu'o //
translated: Thus, the minds explained above are sixty.

original: de dag gnyis su bsgyur ba ni sum cu'o //
analyzed: de dag gnyis su bsgyur ba ni sum cu'o //

original: de bzhin du gsum du bsgyur ba ni nyi shu'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gsum du bsgyur ba ni nyi shu'o //

original: bzhir bsgyur ba ni bco lnga'o //
analyzed: bzhir bsgyur ba ni bco lnga'o //
translated: When quadrupled, they are fifteen.

original: lngar bsgyur ba ni bcu gnyis so //
analyzed: lngar bsgyur ba ni bcu gnyis so //
translated: When quintupled, they are twelve.

original: yang gsum gnyis su bsgyur ba ni drug go //
analyzed: yang gsum gnyis su bsgyur ba ni drug go //

original: grangs bzhi gnyis su bsgyur ba ni bdun no //
analyzed: grangs bzhi gnyis su bsgyur ba ni bdun no //

original: grangs lnga gnyis su bsgyur ba ni drug go //
analyzed: grangs lnga gnyis su bsgyur ba ni drug go //

original: de lta bas na tshul 'dis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems drug cu bgrang ba dag sems brgya drug cur 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na tshul 'dis 'dod chags la sogs pa'i sems drug cu bgrang ba dag sems brgya drug cur 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
translated: Thus, by this method, the sixty minds of desire and so on are to be understood as one hundred and sixty minds.

original: 'di ni rnal 'byor pa gang zag la bdag med par rtogs par bya ba la zhugs pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ni rnal 'byor pa gang zag la bdag med par rtogs par bya ba la zhugs pa'am /

analyzed: gang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs par bya ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa yin pas /
translated: It is the antithesis of the realization of the no self of the individual and of phenomena.üîΩ

original: de'i phyir gang zag la bdag med pa'i lam rtog pas spang bar bya ba dang / gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i lam rtog pas spang bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang zag la bdag med pa'i lam rtog pas spang bar bya ba dang / gang zag dang chos la bdag med pa'i lam rtog pas spang bar bya ba yin te /
translated: The path realizing the selflessness of persons is abandoned by the path of seeing, and the path realizing the selflessness of persons and phenomena is abandoned by the path of meditation.üîΩThe Tantra Requested by SubƒÅhu states:

analyzed: rgyud las / 'jig rten pa'i sems brgya drug cu bskal pa gsum gyis 'das pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems skye ba ni 'di lta ste /

original: 'di ni phung po tsam nyid de //
analyzed: 'di ni phung po tsam nyid de //

original: bdag ni nam yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: bdag ni nam yang yod ma yin //

original: dbang po grong khyer khams rnams kyis //
analyzed: dbang po grong khyer khams rnams kyis //

analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang rgyas par gsungs pa @9b pa yin no //

analyzed: sems brgya drug cur sbyar ba zhar la 'ongs pa 'di ni rdzogs so /

original: // / dkyus ma brjod par bya ba ste /
analyzed: // / dkyus ma brjod par bya ba ste /

original: gong du bshad pa'i tshul gyis na /
analyzed: gong du bshad pa'i tshul gyis na /

original: par byed de de'i rim pa ni 'di'o //üîΩgang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs pa'i lam ji ltar khong du chud pa de nyid du 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i sems mngon par 'du byed pa'i bsgom pas goms par byed cing sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sbyin pa la
analyzed: par byed de de'i rim pa ni 'di'o // gang zag dang chos la bdag med par rtogs pa'i lam ji ltar khong du chud pa de nyid du 'jug pa dang gnas pa dang ldang ba'i sems mngon par 'du byed pa'i bsgom pas goms par byed cing sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sbyin pa la
translated: The stages of that are as follows.

translated: They cultivate the path of the realization of the selflessness of persons and of phenomena through the meditation that is the mental application of entering, abiding, and rising in that very [realization], and they care for sentient beings by accomplishing the practice of the perfections such as generosity through the four means of gathering [disciples].

original: sa bcu pa la 'jug par byed pa rnams dang / de dag gi rgyu mthun pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi yon tan rnams ma thob kyang thos pa dang bsams pas rtogs pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis de dag la 'jug pa'i chos kyi tshig dag gis bstan pa rnams la de kho na lar yin no zhes

translated: Even though they have not attained the qualities of body, speech and mind that are the causes and effects of the ten levels, through the power of the wisdom of listening and contemplating, they have conviction in the teachings that introduce one to those levels and they think, Those words of the teachings that introduce one to those levels are indeed the truth.

analyzed: mos pa ni mos pa yin no //

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mos pa sngon du 'gro ba ci rigs par rang dang gzhan gyi don bsgrub pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de ni mos pas spyod pa yin te /

analyzed: mos pas spyod pa nyid bzhi'i don gyi sa yin no //

analyzed: sems gsum rnam par bsgom pa ste //

analyzed: pha rol phyin rnams spyod pa dang // bsdu ba dag ni bzhi po yis //

analyzed: dpag med ye shes 'byung ba ni //

analyzed: mos pa zhes ni bya bar bshad // blo ldan bskal pa gcig gis ni //

analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa yin no //

analyzed: pa'i sar bshad pa 'di nyid dang ye shes kyi sa bcu rdzogs par byed pa'i chos dag las mos pa'i sa'i sems bcu po 'di dag gsal bar byed pa ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma dang 'brel pa gsang ba'i rim pa
translated: that is connected to this tantra.

analyzed: phye ba las gzhung 'di sa yang dag par bstan te /

analyzed: sems skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med par khong du chud pa'i mtshan nyid ni rtogs pa dang po yin no //

analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i sems gsum pa yin no //

translated: Lord of Secrets, by accomplishing these three thoughts, the levels, perfections and ways of attracting disciples are accomplished.

analyzed: sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dag gis yang dag par len du bcug ste /
translated: Lord of Secrets, in this regard, the bodhisattvas who practice the levels and perfections and who practice the bodhisattva activities by way of the mantra approach, endowed with means, wisdom and knowledge, when they cause sentient beings to take up the four ways of attracting disciples,

analyzed: bdag nyid kyang de la gnas par 'gyur te /

analyzed: 'di ni 'di'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag gi sbyor ba yin par blta'o //

analyzed: gsang pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' sems 'od gsal zhing sems kyi phyogs bcu'i chos la khyab pa gang gi tshe /

analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni 'di'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i yan lag dag bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yin par blta'o //
translated: Guhyapati, this should be seen as the application of accomplishing the branches of the levels and perfections.

original: gsang ba'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang gi tshe sems de nyid bsam gtan thams cad la mi lta bar ye shes dang ldan pa'i blos nges par sems shing gzhan dag kyang de la yang
analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa gang gi tshe sems de nyid bsam gtan thams cad la mi lta bar ye shes dang ldan pa'i blos nges par sems shing gzhan dag kyang de la yang

analyzed: la 'god par byed pa de'i tshe 'di'i sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i yan lag 'grub pa yin par blta'o //

analyzed: gsang ba'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa bsam gtan gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang ldan pa ni sems de nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa'i blos bdag nyid kyang 'jig

analyzed: rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rnam par spyod par byed pa la gnas par 'gyur zhing gzhan dag kyang de la 'god par byed de /
